name: T's Sweet Potato Fries
author: Wannabe Gardener
summary: These fries are a healthy alternative to the old standard French fries. The Italian seasoning and lemon pepper add an interesting twist to this vegetable.
ingredients: 4  sweet potatoes, cut into large French fries
1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place the cut sweet potatoes into a microwave-safe dish with the water
Cook on in the microwave for 5 minutes on full power
Drain off liquid, and toss with Italian seasoning, lemon pepper, salt, pepper, and olive oil
Arrange fries on a baking sheet in a single layer
Bake for 30 minutes, turning once, or until fries are crispy on the outside
